title: God of Blackfield
summary:
“Who am I?!”  
  
Leaving only black soot and dead bodies in his wake, Kang Chan, the “God of Blackfield,” struck fear into the hearts of his enemies.

But one day, in the chaos of battle, his life was abruptly snuffed out.

“I’ve been shot… but the bullet came from behind me!”

Revived three years later, this “god” is now a wimpy high schooler with major problems — savage bullies, shady business dealings, and even girls.

Revenge seemed like a straight shot, but high school is a battlefield all of its own!

title: The strongest assassin gets transferred to another world with his whole class
summary:
An ordinary high school student by day, an assassin living in the underworld by the night. A boy with two faces, Aragi Kai. His classmates hate him because of his anti-social character and weird aura.

One day, Aragi and his classmates were suddenly transferred to another world. It is a world of swords and magic. A woman who calls herself Leonora appears before the confused students, and declares…

“You are Hero Candidates summoned here to defeat the Demon King. Please help us.”

Leonora grants each of the students a unique ability: ‘Divine Protection’. While some powerful ‘Divine Protections’ are given like telekinesis and destructive blast, Aragi’s ‘Divine Protection’ is judgment.

title: The Legendary Hunter Becomes Young Again
summary:
"If only I were 10 years younger…!!"
<A special reward is given that reflects the target's wish.>
Gwak Pilseong, a legendary hunter enjoying his retirement at the age of 80.
He accidentally gains the ability of immortality and rejuvenates, returning to the hunter industry after a long hiatus…
There are… too many rotten scoundrels in the hunter industry!

title: One Night With Deep Passions
summary:
One drunken night led her into the wrong room—a room where she provoked a devil who could never be sated. When dawn broke, she fled in a panic. However, he continued to linger around her like a haunting shadow, overwhelming her with his flirtatious behavior.

He declared that the one night spent together meant that they must show endless devotion to each other for the rest of their lives. 

Every moment, thoughts of her consumed him, and the devil demanded she take responsibility.

title: Selena
summary: Welcome to Wellenberg, Meuracevia at the turn of the 19th century. The fate of Serenity Hotel, an opulent hotel in the nation’s capital, hangs by a thread as its headstrong heiress Serena and her stern husband Eiser struggle to turn its fortune around. Their loveless marriage of convenience takes a twisted turn following Serena’s jealous attachment to her stoic and handsome servant, Frederick. At a time when happiness takes a back seat to one’s sense of duty, will Serena be able to protect her love and ensure the survival of her family and her business?

title: Her Marriage Was Called Off at Daytime, the Cutely Fierce Commander Asked Her For a Hug at Night
I Become a fool when it comes to my Daughter
summary:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.

title: Sovereign and Heartburn
summary: Aria’s world is thrown into chaos when Crown Prince Julius, the brilliant but insufferable royal she’s sworn to protect as Captain of his Guard, announces her as his future bride. Stunned, Aria confronts him, and Julius offers a way out: if she can defeat him in any competition before the wedding in six months, he’ll cancel the engagement. But with Julius’ unmatched skills, winning won’t be easy. Can Aria outsmart the talented prince and reclaim her life?

title: Pyeonghwa Restaurant
summary: Chef Sua, with her unrivaled culinary skills, doesn't just rule over Peace Restaurant, Seoul's most peculiar eatery -- she weaves harmony between cosmic enemies now seated as tablemates. The tension in her restaurant simmers not from culinary rivalry but from the precarious peace among patrons from warring dimensions. Will Sua's culinary diplomacy be enough to maintain this balance, or is her restaurant destined to become the epicenter of an ultimate showdown?

title: Overlord of Insects
summary: Having been transported into a world where everyone is a Job-Changer, Jiang Chen awakened the Insect Domination System! The little insects can evolve, attack, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can breed invincible natural disasters!

title: Taming the Munchkin
summary:
She was reborn as the antagonist of a fantasy novel, a child who bears her family’s resentment.

As it stands, her fate is to end up on the guillotine at the hands of the furious villagers!

Kynemeia, for the sake of a comfortable future, plans to gather some Munchkins to govern the fief. However, there’s one problem…

Kynemeia stared blankly at the boy sitting in the underground prison.

“…Why?”

“I got caught.”

She’s on the receiving end of an unwanted obsession from a suspicious mage?!

This is the story of the struggles of a Grand Duke’s daughter who wishes to transform her life

and the Munchkin mage who feigns innocence!

title: I Thought I Didn’t Have Long To Live!
summary:
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanchett, was told she only had three months left to live. She decided that she didn't want to go quietly, so she decided to create and complete her bucket list! 

1. Treat her maid Anne to cakes
2. Gain independence and wealth
3. Get rid of her fiancé, the Marquis of Secreb
4. Date someone handsome for three months
5. Take a trip to the West!

...But it was only after she ran away that she realised... the fact her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanche, was diagnosed with a terminal illness and three months left to live. She decided to try to achieve her bucket list since she was going to die anyway. First, dumping an older fiancé whom she doesn't even love. Second, dating the monster Duke of Candel for three months! But it was only after she ran away from him that she realized, the fact that her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9021824), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801711)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/haiyiwieshijuezheng/list?title_no=2313)

title: Lover Of Green Midnight
summary:
One day, Nao Anekawa was asked by a strange talking mascot if she would like to appear on TV. Although she refused, she was forced to sign a contract, and before she knew it, she had been taken to a place she didn't know... 13 other men had also been brought there. They were all great men who had left their mark on history!! What's more, the TV program she will be appearing on with them is a love reality show!? Together with the 13 great men, this struggling girl will search for her one and only "destiny"!

(Source: Comic Zenon, translated)

title: In the Spring Shadow
summary:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

title: Like A Wind On A Dry Branch
summary:
Count Casarius fell victim to a plague and died suddenly, leaving behind a will stating that Rietta, a beautiful young widow of the manor, whom he tried to use as a concubine, be buried alive alongside him. Just before Rietta is buried, Archduke Axias, rumored to be a cruel tyrant, arrives at the funeral to collect the enormous debt Count Casarius still owes him.

"Everyone here seems to feel sorry for her, and I still have a debt to collect from Casarius… If I take her instead, I think all of you here should be happy," he smiled, "Hello, my temptress."

---
As plague and turmoil afflicts the empire, enchanting widow Rieta Tristi finds herself at the mercy of a malicious nobleman and his dying wish to have her buried alive beside his corpse. The plague has taken her husband, slave traders have taken her young child, and now her own life is at risk -- until an unexpected visit from the empire's outcast prince changes everything.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5489043), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=748535&weekday=wed)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2405)

* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/likeawind/list?title_no=2272)
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2572)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2585)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/cursed-blessing/list?title_no=2298)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001066)
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2682)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/cursed-blessing/list?title_no=2330)

title: Locked to Death
summary: “Hye-seong,” a boy living on a remote island, meets “Yoon-hae,” a mermaid he met in the sea, and they become each other’s only friends. However, the two soon break up against each other due to Hye-seong’s move. Six years later, Yunhae gains mysterious abilities and returns to Comet. However, many things have changed for Hyesung to spend all his time with Yunhae like he did when he was young. “I’m a different person than you, Yoonhae.” Yoon Hae's attachment to the comet is slowly spreading into control... The winner of the 2nd largest contest on earth in 2022.

title: We Lost Our Engagement
summary: The story is set on one day during summer vacation. It follows a group of boys who try to view a fireworks display from the town lighthouse to see if they look round or flat when viewed from the side. Meanwhile, one of the boys, Norimichi, receives an invitation from his crush Nazuna to run away with her.

title: Youth Diary
summary: After overcoming a miserable life, she entered the university with an excitement. Dabom, who have million of dreams and desires for university, encountered a villain from her very first day... And it's somewhat awkward/unfitting from the start! "Would my campus life be okay this way?!"

title: The Scent That Binds Us
summary:
1945, Ueno. The souls of those that lost everything burst at the ruins left by the war.  
  
Kanekichi, a war orphan who lost his family continues to struggle in despair.  
But upon meeting a mysterious young man, Kanaida, the boy's heart starts unraveling …?

title: School of Romance Fantasy
summary:
"My school suddenly turned into the romance fantasy novel I was reading?!"

Sanho, the protagonist, becomes the only commoner at a prestigious academy academy and the only one who remembers the real world.

While she's still trying to make sense of the bizarre situation, a sudden mission alert pops up.

To uncover the truth behind this strange new world, she must complete missions that involve winning over three male leads...

In a world unknown, can Sanho complete the missions and face the truth?

title: Tears on a Withered Flower
summary: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.

title: Before I knew it, I had stolen the Dark Lord’s Heart
summary:
Seeing the relationship between Duke Willow, the Sword of the North, and her father who's his guardian knight, Celine has been looking forward to meeting her lord, Damian. However, the Damian she encountered was a skinny, frail boy with a bright smile that belied his Northern Majesty. To fulfil her duty as a guardian knight, she decided to take her lord's side, no matter what kind of person he was. But there's something fishy about this frail boy...

---
Ten-year-old Celine Mars dreams of becoming a great knight escort just like her father. She’s set to serve under Damien Willow, the heir of a powerful Duke. There’s only one problem—he’s a total weakling, or so she thinks. Celine vows to train the poor, defenseless Damien to stand up for himself, completely unaware of his real strength. Meanwhile, Damien instantly takes a liking to Celine, finding her cluelessness and pure intentions both amusing and endearing. When will Celine finally realize she’s got the wrong idea about Damien?

title: Hoping for My Death
summary:
In pursuit of a natural death, Silvia reluctantly agrees to a strategic marriage. To deceive the gods, she must convincingly play the role of a married couple.

"Shall we turn off the lights then?"
"Why would we...?"
"Don't we have to consummate our marriage on the first night?"
"Why is that necessary?"

Isn't my husband too conservative?

Silvia, who yearns for a chance to die, and Randal, who struggles with conflicting emotions, embark on an unexpected healing romance.

title: Girl with a Knife
summary:
“Onii-san, congratulations on your marriage. This person is your bride.”

“M-my name is Watanae Yuuka… I’m in the same class as you…”

My name is Sakata Yuuichi. I’m in my 2nd year of high school. Due to my parents’ circumstances, I’m suddenly getting married..? Furthermore, my partner is a plain girl, Watanae-san. During my 3rd year of middle school, I went through a bad experience. Ever since then, I’ve only been interested in 2D heroines. There’s absolutely no way I’d ever be interested in a 3D girl. That was what I thought, but…

“…Well then, who’s your favorite heroine right now?”

Turns out, she was actually an otaku and she becomes very talkative when you get to know her. She’d always happily engage in our conversations. She showed me things I’d never have expected from a girl in my class.

“Err, since we’re going to be living together… Is it okay if I call you Yuu-kun?”

And, the moment I let my guard down, she’d instantly try to shorten the distance between us. What’s more…

“Just between you and me, I’m actually the voice actress for Yuuna Izumi from 『Alice Stage』. Thank you for always supporting me!”

It’s a secret from everyone else, but it turns out she’s actually my favorite heroine’s voice actress?! I am only interested in 2D heroines! But, Yuuka’s true self, which she only shows when she’s alone with me, is nothing but cute! This is the story of me and Yuuka, starting as bethrothed. A heartwarming and chaotic romcom!

title: A Romantic Ending with My 2D Boyfriend!
summary: From flirts to mama’s boys to married men, intentionally Sun Choi keeps dating men like those. Promising to herself, not to date men like those ever again, she developed a game called ‘Dating Simulation.’ Since its release is just around the corner that she went to work even on the weekend and played the game as a developer. She plays a ‘share house version’ where you can meet various men of various classes all at once. However, she gets wakes up in the game as the female character.

title: The Strongest Florist
summary:
Even though he’s built like a fighter with a fearsome scowl, Jaeho would love nothing more than to become a florist instead. Unfortunately, Jaeho’s overbearing father disapproves, pushing his son to become an MMA fighter instead. Jaeho enters the virtual reality game, New World, to escape his father’s ambitions, but will he be able to realize his dreams?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KQU_1f_ujBw)
  
- [Original Web Novel <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.nhn?productNo=4231463)
---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/comedy/macho-florist/list?title_no=2203)  

- [Official Spanish (Es) Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/the-strongest-florist/list?title_no=2948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/comedy/too-strong-to-be-a-florist/list?title_no=2041)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000851)

title: Jakdu
summary: Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.

title: Gold Hands
summary: I'm just his personal caretaker, or is there something more…?

title: The Delusional Hunter in Another
summary:
"I have a little secret. I'm from an alien planet far, far away.

However... fate had other plans. I found myself reincarnated into the body of someone who had literally starved to death! Will Gi-ryeo be able to find a way to adapt to this strange planet called Earth and keep his true identity hidden?"

title: Reincarnation Path of The Underworld King
summary: The underworld has collapsed. In the barren land where blood should flow, now clear water flows, and the cauldron that used to boil the souls has long since gone cold. The retired King of Underworld, in pursuit of his own happiness, seeks the path of reincarnation. However, due to the chaos in Underworld and the disappearance of his successor, he is unable to walk the path of reincarnation. To become a god in the human world and to track down the missing successor, The King of Underworld descends to the human world. But the human world is in chaos due to the escape of the deceased from Hell, orchestrated by his successor’s masterful plan. The King of Underworld joins forces with the ‘Guardians of the Life’ who protect humans, using the power of the Hell’s ledger, in a struggle to capture his successor and restore the world to its original state. Will King of Underworld be able to safely walk the path of reincarnation?

title: Growth-Type Superhero
summary: In a world where humanity battles monsters with powerful weapons called Relics, Hinata Asahi is the ultimate underdog at Valkyria Academy, a school for training warriors. Mocked for his relic, a gimmicky suit that looks like a comic book costume, and bullied by classmates, no one knows it holds a secret. The more he is pushed down, the stronger it becomes. Driven by his father’s legacy, Hinata forges new friendships and pushes past every obstacle. With unwavering determination, can he rise to become one of the academy’s strongest?

title: Rebirth of the Malicious Empress of Military Lineage
The Night Clenched in Your Hands
summary:
Collection of one-shots by author Umino Tsunami.

**Volume 1**:
1. **Tamagoyaki** (Baked Eggs, たまごやき)
2. **Kiseki no Haru** (The vernal wonder, 奇跡の春)
3. **Sekai no Owari ni Kimi wo Omou** (I think of You in the End of the World, 世界の終わりに君を想う)
4. **Ryoute ni Ai wo Tsukame!** (Hold Love in both Hands!, 両手に愛をつかめ!)
5. **Reform Tousan** (Re-form—find Enjoyment in my Life, リフォーム父さん)

**Volume 2**:
1. **Shounen Ningyo** (Little Merman, 少年人魚)
2. **2-banme ni Suki na Hito** (The Second Favorite Person, 2番目に好きなひと)
3. **Chance wo Choudai** (The Ultra Great Operation of Love, チャンスをちょうだい)
4. **Poolside no Ningyo Hime** (Princess Goldfish, プールサイドの人魚姫)
5. **Juuni Yoru - Christmas no Juuni Nichi** (Twelfth Night, 十二夜―クリスマスの十二日―)

title: Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: All My Alter Egos Are Tycoons
summary:
Seonghyeon Han is a victim of a violent crime that left him with impaired legs and a fear of the outside world. Now, he faces an even greater challenge: while he gained the power to create clones, he has just 24 hours before being sent to another dimension.

As the countdown ticks down, Seonghyeon makes a desperate move -- he sends his clone through the interdimensional portal, and discovers his real body can remain safe at home.

Thus begins the epic tale of Seonghyeon's... clones.

title: After the School Belle Dumped Me, I Became a Martial Arts God
The Secret Game of Nobles
summary: An all-color alternate story of the original classic, Space Adventure Cobra.

title: The Abandoned Saintess’s Vow: To Deny the Prince’s Love in Her Next Life
The doomsday ruthless man: hoarding trillions of supplies at the beginning
summary: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

title: Reborn Ranker – Gravity User (Manga)
summary: “Who needs a bandit, anyway?” That’s the last thing Ikoma Ichinose, a bandit-class hunter, heard before he got kicked out of his party and ran into a monster that would kill him. But he was given a second chance at life in the form of a time-turning pocket watch. “Yeah, who needs a bandit?” This time, Ikoma chooses to be a gravity master to have a shot at becoming the greatest hunter of all time.

title: I Can’t Date a Fictional Man!
Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
summary:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

title: My Little Brother Is The Academy’s Hotshot
I Ended Up Training the Villain Too Well Too Early
summary: On their 10th birthday, a child regains memories of a past life and realizes their family is destined to be destroyed by a future villain. To prevent this, they decide to raise the neglected prince, the future villain, with care and guidance. However, their efforts work too well, leading to unintended consequences.

title: Lay Down Your Sword in the Bedroom
Drug Devourer
summary:
One day, a gate suddenly opened in the heavens, bringing with it the invasion of monsters and the intervention of monks in the human world.

『Miracle Drug “Coffee” Administration』

『Medicinal Contents: Caffeine and Sugar』
☞ Provides energy
☞ Stimulates the central nervous system
☞ Maximizes senses and reflexes

The whole world appeared to slow down, and Hanyul’s medications began to show their true effects.

title: Home Plate Villain
summary: To meet his dead parents again, Hong Bin made a deal with the Baseball Fairy, who agreed to return him to the past if he achieved 3,000 career hits as a baseball player. And at the age of 40, Bin the baseball legend hits his last ball and goes back in time. After reuniting with his family, Bin decides to pursue his old dream of joining the major league. The only issue is that he's lost all his old skills as a pro! But will his past experiences be enough to help this legend fulfill his new goal?
